contentText: Hello, I am Arif Talha Uslu. I am a software developer. I live in Ankara, Turkey. I was born in 2001. I have been working as a software engineer at Forte Information Communication Technologies and Defense Industry Inc. since November 2022. I am familiar with various technologies such as ASP.NET and ASP.NET Core (MVC, Web API), ADO.NET, React, SQL (PostgreSQL, MSSQL, Oracle Toad), HTML/CSS/JS. I pay attention to details and maintain my structured work style. Additionally, I have a strong interest in SOLID principles and Design Patterns, which provide my motivation to build robust software architectures. You can reach me at ariftalhauslu@gmail.com

list.header: Forte Bilgi İletişim Teknolojileri ve Savunma Sanayi A.Ş. - Software Engineer
list.text: Working to add new modules and capabilities by using the latest technologies in line with the evolving needs of the software used on the information systems infrastructure run by the Land Forces Command.
According to the protocol signed with Gazi University, the top 10 students who got the best grades of the department were entitled to internship here.

list.header: ELD Bilişim Sanayi Ticaret A.Ş. - Intern
list.text: Developing a web project that can work dynamically with database manipulations, using Entity Framework, ASP.NET MVC C# and JavaScript.

list.header: University, Gazi University Computer Programming, Ankara
list.text:
Graduation Degree: 3.84 / 4 

Graduated as the First of the Department
In order to study in this high school, you must get at least 460 points from the secondary school to high school transition exam called TEOG.
